 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָבַב‎</span>] **verb** ==hollow out== (compare Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***imbubu***</u></abbr>, ***flute***, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>HWB 443</sup>, Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַבּוּב‎</span> ***id.***, Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַבּוּבָא‎</span> ***id.***; hence also Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***knots*** in reed, ***part of*** reed ***between knots, reed***; see [[BDB#Hoffm|Hoffm]]<sup>LCB 1882, 321</sup> [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>23</sup> [[BDB#Fl|Fl]] in [[BDB#Levy|Levy]]<sup>TW i. 417</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Passive participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָבוּב‎</span> [[Job.11.12|Job 11:12]]; [[Jer.52.21|Jer 52:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְבוּב‎</span> [[Exod.27.8|Exod 27:8]]; [[Exod.38.7|Exod 38:7]] — ***hollowed, hollow:*** of altar of tabernacle <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְבוּב לֻחוֺת‎</span> [[Exod.27.8|Exod 27:8]]; [[Exod.38.7|Exod 38:7]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); of pillar in temple [[Jer.52.21|Jer 52:21]] figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִישׁ נָבוּב‎</span> [[Job.11.12|Job 11:12]], i.e. ***empty, hollow-minded*** man. 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹ֫בֶה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹב‎</span>.
